inlineContent.text: Integrate standard calendar UI into your app using
EventKitUI provides standard view controllers for
creating, editing, and viewing event details.
Handle the delegate with a Coordinator.
Present the new event creation screen.
Which view controller in EventKitUI is used for editing events?
standard UI for creating and editing events.
How do you use a UIKit view controller in SwiftUI?
UIKit view controllers as SwiftUI Views.
UIKit view controllers cannot be used
Use directly in the View body

and save them.

reminders using EventKit.

daily, weekly, or monthly.
